definitions.definition: The act of relying ( on or in someone or something); trust .
examples: Your reliance on his expertise may be misplaced.

definitions.definition: The condition of being reliant or dependent .
examples: The industry is working to phase out its reliance on fossil fuels.

definitions.definition: Anything on which to rely; ground of trust.
examples: The boat was a poor reliance .

definitions.definition: A person or thing which relies on another. (The addition of quotations indicative of this usage is being sought:)

main_definition: The act of relying ( on or in someone or something); trust .
secondary_definitions: The condition of being reliant or dependent .
( dated ) Anything on which to rely; ground of trust.
A person or thing which relies on another. (The addition of quotations indicative of this usage is being sought:)
